of Valinor|Two Trees]] in Valinor *[[Aulë]] creates the [[Fathers of the Dwarves|Seven Fathers]] of the [[Dwarves]] *[[Manwë]] and Yavanna devise the [[Eagles]] and the [[Ents]] respectively *[[Varda]] fashions new [[Stars]] and puts the [[Valacirca]] in the North *The [[Darkening of Valinor]] | colspan="2" | *The [[Awakening of the Elves|Awakening]] of the [[Elves]] by [[Cuiviénen]] and [[Rings of Power]] are forged and distributed *The appearance of the [[Nazgûl]] *The [[Downfall of Númenor]] and the [[Changing of the World]] *[[Arnor]] and [[Gondor]] are founded in Middle-earth
